title: Self Introduction
description: Learn how to introduce yourself in a casual setting

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: Hi there! I don't think we've met. I'm Sarah.

lines.speaker: user
lines.text: Nice to meet you, Sarah. I'm Taro.

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: Nice to meet you too, Taro! Where are you from?

lines.speaker: user
lines.text: I'm from Tokyo, Japan. How about you?

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: I'm from San Francisco. What brings you here?

lines.speaker: user
lines.text: I'm here for a business trip. I work in software development.

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: That's interesting! How long have you been in the industry?

lines.speaker: user
lines.text: About five years now. I really enjoy it.

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: That's great! It was nice meeting you.

lines.speaker: user
lines.text: You too! Have a great day.
